title: Noam Chomsky - Why does the USA support Israel
description:
Source video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lUQ_0MubbcM

In this thought-provoking clip, renowned linguist and political theorist Noam Chomsky explores the complex reasons behind the United States' longstanding support for Israel. With his signature insight, Chomsky examines historical, political, and strategic factors that have shaped American foreign policy in the Middle East, shedding light on the geopolitical interests and ideological motivations at play. He delves into the influence of political lobbies, economic ties, and the role of the U.S. as a global superpower.
